Comment: The Sicilian Defense. I don't like this opening, because it has too much defense. I like more open games, preferably the Scottish. Anyhow, I always play the same way against opponents that play this.
The Sicilian Defense. I don't like this opening, because it has too much defense. I like more open games, preferably the Scottish. Anyhow, I always play the same way against opponents that play this.
Bd3, and not Nc3. I don't like that later, Black's knight can go to Ne5, then Nc4. I protect that, and start up a new game.
